comment: Stormy Daniels will go down in history as a garbage human. Trump will go down in history as a transformational president of the United States. And that's today's lesson in "who bitch this is?".
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / go-down-27
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Stormy"
                        :op2 "Daniels"))
            :time (h / history)
            :prep-as (h2 / human
                  :mod (g2 / garbage)))
      :snt2 (g3 / go-down-27
            :ARG1 (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Trump"))
            :time (h3 / history)
            :prep-as (p3 / person
                  :ARG0-of (h4 / have-org-role-91

                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "United"
                                    :op2 "States"))
                        :ARG2 (p4 / president
                              :ARG0-of (t / transform-01)))))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op2 (l / lesson
                  :topic (b / bitch-01
                        :ARG0 (a2 / amr-unknown)
                        :ARG1 (t2 / this))
                  :time (t3 / today))))

comment: come on, you can air your beefs with Trump, but you can't say with a straight face that he won't be remembered. Whatever else Trump accomplishes, he will go into the history books as a paradigm-shifting larger than life President.
amr:

            :ARG1 (y / you))
      :snt2 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (p / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (a / air-01
                        :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                        :ARG1 (b / beef
                              :poss y2)
                        :ARG2 (p2 / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Trump"))))
            :ARG2 (p3 / possible-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (s / say-01
                        :ARG0 y2
                        :ARG1 (r / remember-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG1 p2)
                        :manner (f / face
                              :ARG1-of (s2 / straight-04)))))
      :snt3 (w / whatever
            :ARG1-of (a2 / accomplish-01
                  :ARG0 (p4 / person
                        :name n
                        :op1 "Trump")))
      :mod (e / else)

            :ARG1 (p5 / paradigm)
            :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG2 (l / large)
                  :ARG3 (m2 / more)
                  :ARG4 (l2 / life))))
